channel.title: How do i make it so that u need arrows/bolts for bows

item.title: How do i make it so that u need arrows/bolts for bows
item.dc:creator: @Skullator Skullator
item.description:
@Skullator wrote:

In your Ranging void, where you equip the bow, and shoot it and all add something like this by the bow part -

[code] if(playerEquipment[PlayerArrows], arrow id);[code]
What that will do is it will check if you have arrows before proceeding with the actual shooting of the bow, I don’t think it’s the exact code but it’s something to work on. Search PlayerEquipment if you client.java, it will show you how it’s supposed to look like.

Hope this helps![/code][/code]

Read full topic
